class.name: PanoramaSkyCommonMaterial
class.brief_description: A base class for a [Material] which is used with [Sky] to draw a background texture.
class.description: This is a base class for [PanoramaSkyMaterial] and [ComputePanoramaSkyMaterial] which implements common functionality, though this class is not exported to the editor. You should not use this class directly, but rather use one of its derived classes.

members.member: A boolean value to determine if the background texture should be filtered or not.
